about_the_game:
Career

Race your way from stock Group D vehicles all the way up to pro rally Group R beasts. Choose your path through the career as you in 55 race series. Collect stars and liveries by winning races, collect vehicles by winning championships. The career will keep you in the driver seat for up to 11-25 hours.

Time Trials


Improve your skills and compete with other players to set your best pace on 672 world-wide leaderboards. Each of the 8 race courses has 12 track layouts with dynamic traction surfaces that will keep you on your toes lap after lap.

Multiplayer Racing


Customize your online races with control over the laps, time, damage, and more. Create a quick 3 lap sprint or a grueling 24 hour endurance race, the options are endless. Multiplayer also has a Free Roam mode to explore each map with your friends. You choose how you want to play.

Destruction


Each of the 27 vehicles have their performance impacted as you make contact with other players, walls, and obstacles. From bent suspension and steering to losing wheels and tires, driving carelessly will keep you from the top of the podium.

Free Roam


Take as much time as you need in a casual drive around the track. Try a new line through a corner or nail a specific braking zone. Add some friends in multiplayer and explore everything each course has to offer.

name: RXC - Rally Cross Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 Service Pack 1
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 3.5Ghz / Intel Core i3-6300 3.8Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7750 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.0Ghz / Intel Core i7-6700 3.4Ghz (or better)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 290 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Battle the world in reckless races as you bash, slide, and jump your way to the checkered flag. This isn't just another top-down arcade racing game. Made by two brothers, RXC is a physics heavy racing game with a traction and handling model that challenges sim racers and is still fun for newcomers.
